posts.post_content: Kind of got the itch to buy something other than caramels! Looking for low grade commons, maybe even a hofer, of a grade from 1-3. If it is a good price I would consider a 4. Please send offers to [url]piannicelli89@yahoo.com[/url]
Look under the "20th century tobacco cards" tab here: [url]http://t206.monkberry.com/[/url]
